website_summaries.verdict: A good quality 24-inch monitor with a stylish look and a good price.
pros: A very thin monitor with a brushed metallic look
Includes HDMI and VGA ports plus a 3.4-millimeter Mini-Jack audio out
Blue light shift helps reduce eye fatigue
cons: The plug has a very big box and takes up a lot of space

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck 24 inch thin bezel monitor
customer_reviews.text: Thin bezel, Easily goes next to each other with small frame line. 2 hole VESA is no issue due to how light they are, Power transformer on the plug keeps the monitor light and thin, Worked right out of the box, no power off issues. I have 4 working off my laptop using display link adapters Modified the stand on the lower left for a desk top 0 clearance Using a Mount-It! MI-789 Triple Monitor Stand Freestanding LCD Computer Screen Desk Mount for the upper 3
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dittfurth

customer_reviews.title: Broke down after just over a year of use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor, easily worth every penny until just after a year of use it just stops working. No damage to it I’ve always taken great care of it and it just stops working. Outside of only getting a year of use out of it it was a great monitor that before it stopped working I would have easily bought several more.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great price
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the brand, but I'm glad I picked this up. I'm using this as my sidekick to my larger gaming monitor. I was really impressed with the packaging and little screw driver provided.The monitor itself looks really great; super thin with clean lines. The menu buttons and Sceptre's bright rear input color coding is a little odd. The menu buttons are on the back and are easy to use, once you figure them out. The monitor looks great at 1080p watching videos and has up/down tilt. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is Defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these monitors a year ago. I did not get the chance to use them until now. Since, I am working from home. So I had no idea until I unpackaged them a few months ago that I discovered one out of the two was defective. When I troubleshot it, it would turn on for a few seconds and then abruptly shut off. Initially, it was an painstaking inconvenience because I only used the monitors to study for my courses. Now, it is a tremendous work stoppage as I work from home and require both monitors to successfully do my job.
customer_reviews.author: Dontell Glover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I've bought two and need another. They're cheap, light and thin. I use them for work, spreadsheets and all that miserable stuff, so I can't speak to them for gaming, graphic design etc.. but they work awesomely for my needs. For the price, they can't be beat. I also love that they're so thin and light! The build quality is pretty good, again esp for the price. The stock picture shows the corner looking really gapped out but it isn't bad in person, don't really notice any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don't care about picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself looks gorgeous, but the picture is a different story. Between my setup and my girlfriend's setup, we have 5 different monitors from $90 to $400, and this Sceptre monitor has by far the worst picture quality of them all, which is a shame because ALL FOUR of our TV's are Sceptre TVs, which all look incredible. The picture on this monitor is really fuzzy and grainy, and black levels were a joke. While this monitor is light weight, I did NOT feel comfortable with it only having two vesa mounting holes, as opposed to the industry standard of 4. We ultimately returned the monitor after only 1 hour of use
customer_reviews.author: troy turner

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: You really do get what you pay for. Came with missing screws to screw the neck part of the base to the back on the monitor. It wasn't even worth it after wasting 25 minutes of my time trying to figure it out. I returned it and bought an HP brand monitor on Prime Day instead. Difference was night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Nela

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 hours!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for approximately 6 hours, then the backlight broke. I can still see the picture if I use a flashlight and it's definitely hooked up right. It had so many great reviews, that's why I bought it but I must have gotten unlucky with this one.
customer_reviews.author: osidfa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: With the Covid lockdown and working from home, I needed a second display for my laptop. This fit the bill nicely. I have been using this daily for work for almost five months now, and it's perfect for my business/office usage. The monitor is bright, the colors are good, response time is adequate. I'm not a gamer, so I cannot comment on suitability for gaming usage. But for regular office applications, document editing, web browsing and watching the occasional videos, this monitor has performed admirably. I liked it so much, I recently bought a second monitor for my child to use. Highly recommended. Can't go wrong, especially for the price that one pays for it.
customer_reviews.author: Million Miler

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed! (IT professional)
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this monitor for the price. It looks and feels high end. Works perfectly with all my computer systems(Linux, Mac Apple and Windows 10). My MacBook Pro looks great next to this beautiful monitor. The monitor even came with a very nice screwdriver to install the base. I will buy a couple more of these monitors for my office set up. I will update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Phenomenal Price!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these, one for myself and one for my wife to telework since we both have the same laptops with docks. The reason I bought these was the price - they were on sale for $49 each. Little did I know that two years later, I would be using dual monitors and would have to share! Needless to say, I got a promotion and telework four days a week and had to order my third monitor! I LOVE these monitors. The look, the colors, the refresh rate, everything is just phenomenal! I’d recommend these monitors if the cost $300 each. I now also own two Sceptre LCD TVs, because I was so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Morton Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: So the instructions are not too clear on how to set it up, but once I did it works perfectly! Great monitor, doesn't have internal speakers so you will have to get that on your own but it's slim, easy to use, and works great! Love my monitor. The brightness setting was hard to figure out but once you change the user profile on the monitor itself then you can change the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Riboul

customer_reviews.title: Best visual bang for the money, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son while he builds his own PC and I am more than happy with the quality of this display. Sharper than anticipated, the resolution is every bit as good as a mid to high end display at three times the price. Seriously, this is the best visual bang for my buck I've ever purchased. The brightness is great, the response rate is great, we hooked it up to an Xbox One and the refresh rate was flawless. If I had the need to expand my current set up with even more monitors (I have two 27" monitors, I'm good for now!), I would add this monitor without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: B. Downen

customer_reviews.title: The monitor surprised me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Finance and I to work from home as one of the few monitors in stock with decent reviews. I am happy to say they work great and are very modern. The bases are more solid than the ones on my 55" tv! Comes with there own screwdrivers. Screen is virtually glare free. I stick with Samsung, LG mostly but these monitors are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: PhoneGuru84

customer_reviews.title: Worked great but only for a year
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was great for my son's gaming until it just stopped working. According to troubleshooting, it is either the motherboard or the power supply that is now a problem. With my limited electronics expertise, we are just going to have to junk it. There were so many great reviews that I'm surprised it already died. I personally wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mmc42

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were unclear. Nothing about removing the cover on the neck. Until you read the instructions about removing the base. Also the cover on the neck was impossible to remove my twisting. It had to be pried off with a butter knife. Secondly there was a protective over over the screen as expected. But what WASN'T expected was the packing tape across the top and bottom of my screen. I'm just hoping that it doesn't cause a dead pixel. Honestly I can't think of a single reason why there would need to be tape on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and great color, video quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor. Would definitely get another one if anything happened to the one I have. I got this for gaming, got my PS4 hooked up to it by HDMI. The screen quality is great and the color is really nice after playing with the settings a bit. It doesn't have sound, which is something to consider if you don't use a headset or have speakers for a monitor. Wasn't a huge deal, I knew it didn't have sound when I bought it. I'd definitely recommend this if your looking for a budget gaming monitor or a new computer monitor becuase of the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler D.

customer_reviews.title: Washed out picture
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, in this case it's a cheap monitor. Upon first turning it on I was shocked by how bad the contrast looked. Everything was washed out. After fiddling with the settings for a bit I got it to look decent, but not great. Since this is for work and not gaming it's acceptable, but I definitely wouldn't buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Feeni

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and barely going on 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: This screen has been so unreliable! The screen goes black several times throughout the day and lately lasts longer and longer to come back on. I’m barely going on 1 year with it but will have to replace it soon as it’s making it impossible for me to work from home efficiently. As an fyi, I started using it more frequently a few months after I purchased it and immediately started having issues with it, unfortunately for me, I was passed the amazon return period. I tried contacting the company directly and that got me no where. Don’t waste your money, go buy from reputable store and get yourself a good warranty!
customer_reviews.author: cutevero

customer_reviews.title: Power Button Broke in Less Than 60 Days
customer_reviews.text: Monitor worked fine but did not last long. Received the monitor on January 5th. The power button broke on February 21st. Unable to return it because it is out of the 30 days. Very unsatisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mamasan420

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is interesting. I like how sleek and thin it is, but does seem quite cheap. Picture quality is ok for viewing movies and web browsing, but its color accuracy is terrible. It works well for playing video games on as well being that it is a 75hz panel. I would recommend a more expensive option, but if you're on a budget this one will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weber

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed I guarantee it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product I still have both of the ones that I've purchased a year ago. These monitors are excellent for the price and great quality, I highly recommend purchasing these monitors if you are in the market for an upgrade and change of pace from the usual market brands. I am currently reviewing Sceptre models to upgrade. Great buy for the money. You will not be disappointed I guarantee it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: These are well worth the $99.
customer_reviews.text: I needed dual monitors for my home office but didn't want to spend an arm and leg given I rarely work from home. I had been using televisions and even though the TVs are 1080p the picture quality wasn't great and the eyestrain was horrible. These little numbers are fantastic for my needs and BONUS-they don't reflect glare like the TVs do. Pleased with purchase. One of the original ones came with a cracked screen but customer service got me a replacement out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product/investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old monitors I was using with my desktop. So far there are no regrets and I am extremely pleased to say that this is simply an amazing product to invest in. The slim monitor is beyond clear and I am truly astonished at the beauty of it all. The borders are nice and thin rather than the excessive border in other monitors. The only downside of the monitor is with the placement of the interface buttons on the rear (Just takes some getting used to).
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my wife for her online studies and her occasional gaming during the pandemic, I was happy when it arrived as it looked great, kudos for Amazon for going the extra mile for deliveries, but when I went to plug it in, absolutely no sound came out the audio out input, I’ve tried with all my speakers and nothing, It is essentially useless for online clases and gaming, and I feel I just wasted my money, And I won’t get to ease my wives studies woes, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L.

customer_reviews.title: a little tricky to set up, but great monitor
customer_reviews.text: It works for my purposes! I play Minecraft and browse the internet. Setting up the mount was a little tricky. I had to take out the screws a few times to get it from leaning extremely forward. I recommend getting something to set the monitor on, like a stand or some books (that's what I do), because it leans a tiny bit forward and will look awkward if it is below eye-level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: Getting my new office up and running required new monitors. After a ton of research these were the ones that stood out for size an value. They are incredibly crisp in their display and superlight. They are mounted to adjustable monitor arms. Their lightweight allows the arms to be kept more flexible for easy adjustment without the arms sagging under the monitor's weight. I'll be outfitting other workstations with them as monitors need to be purchased/replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Chehalin

customer_reviews.title: Very confused with 1 Star Reviewier!
customer_reviews.text: Like other buyer, I always reviews before I buy. I also read 1star reviews to make sure I am getting the right product. This is my 2nd monitor with sceptre, and both of them having running strong for the last 90 days. I don't have any issues similar to 1star reviews. I am a big fan of Samsung and Sony but their price is very expensive. The same inches monitor can cost around 1/3 more. We have to wait long time to find good deals. But with Sceptre at this price? I am in for 2 monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Top 10 Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I Planned To Return It...Until It Arrived
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor because I thought my old one was busted. Turns out, I hadn't installed my new graphics card properly (D'oh!). Once I figured that out, I had every intention of returning this bad boy, but...man, is it beautiful. A little larger than I expected, but with a ton of great settings. I ended up keeping it out of sheer appreciation for the quality. Will definitely stick with this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Gooden

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It has a great design and very thin. I use it while working on large data sets. It definitely gets easier when you have a large screen like this one instead of a laptop screen. It has 2 mounting holes at the slightly lower part of the back of the monitor. I wish these holes were at the center of the monitor. I have a t shaped desk mount carrying double screen one of which is my old Samsung monitor. I can't align these two monitors horizontally at the same level since the mounting holes are at different locations of the screens in Samsung and Sceptre.
customer_reviews.author: Merve K.

customer_reviews.title: Light, and good picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. I upgraded from a 21.5 inch and the extra 2.5 inches sure add up. The picture is BRIGHT. I had to play with the contrast and brightness to get the colora to not look washed out, but once you hit the sweet spot, it looks great. The 75hz feels just a bit better than 60hz as well. The monitor is super light and thin as well, the base is fine with sturdyness as long as you make the screws tight.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these - one for me since I am remote teaching and one for my son since he is doing grad school remotely. We both wanted to be able to move our Zoom calls from our main device to see what is being presented on our main screen and see our students / fellow students at the same time on another screen. The screen was larger than I thought it would be which is great. The quality of the picture is excellent and it is very lightweight and easy to set up. It came with screws and a screwdriver to assemble the stand. Took all of 3 minutes to put together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, but no sound from XBOX
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality seems to be good and it booted right up without any problems. I like that the stand is metal rather than plastic, it feels very durable. Also it comes with a Phillips screwdriver for installing the stand. My one gripe is that it won't play the sound fr my xbox. I have a surround sound system anyways so it doesnt matter really but it seems I am not the first person to experience this, and there us nothing in the description warning buyers about this issue. Tomorrow I will get a USB-C to HDMI adapter for my laptop. I'll report back if the sound works from my laptop
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Ditto

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed. It's a great looking and great performing monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 24 for my business and when we needed more, I couldn't find them anywhere. Finally, they became available again. Phew! These are thin, have VESA holes for mounting and are nice and bright. The only thing I don't like is the power adapter. It's big and I could barely fit two of the adapters in the same single hang outlet.
customer_reviews.author: J_K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent second screen to work on at my desk, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor and excellent value for the price. I use it in my office to hook up to my laptop so I have a larger second screen to work on. It's nice and bright and I can see the image well even though there's a window directly behind me - glare is only minimal when it's very bright out. This is a good size for my smallish desk, maybe if you had a larger desk and the screen was farther away it would seem too small, or if you're using it for gaming or something like that it might not be ideal. But I've had it for 3 months now and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by the quality of this monitor at such a low price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this monitor which I used to replace an older aging Samsung. The first thnig I noticed was the added clarity and detail which as missing on the Samsung! And besides that, I was impressed with the lightweight, thinness plus the added bonus of energy savings due to the low-power usage of the LEDs!
customer_reviews.author: Aktivator

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Sharp Images
customer_reviews.text: I built a budget gaming PC, and needed a solid monitor to get the job done, but couldn't afford the triple digit prices if I wanted to keep it under that budget. This monitor is a *deal*. The colors are vibrant, it's bright, the images are sharp and clear, there is no ghosting or lag when playing games, and it's a 24" monitor, which is more than adequate for gaming, word processing, and any other task.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Monitors are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to link with my MacBook and I must say it's worth the price! These 24" monitors are bigger than I thought. I'm not sure about gaming, but these monitors work great for regular tasks like work, editing, watching movies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and I use them for work; I am absolutely pleased with the monitor's performance and light weight. If I could pay attention to 3 at one time, I'd get another. Highly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tadlock

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t buy this I’m not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 90; days when I updated to widows 10 wont work called them and they said too bad. Poor customer service. Won’t buy there product again hope you won either!
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Great but sliced my finger
customer_reviews.text: Just writing this review to warn others. This is a great monitor and a great price. However I noticed some powder on the Sceptre logo at the bottom of the screen. I rubbed it with my finger back and forth. Not to hard. And the logo broke off and sliced deep into my finger right into a blood vessel. It’s silly I know maybe it was a freak thing. But just wanted to let others know to be careful. It’s cheap and sharp plastic. Otherwise great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for my "work at home" desk setup!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a monitor for my laptop now that I'm working from home during the COVID-19 pandemic. This was super easy to set up, and it works beautifully. Sooo much better than staring at a small laptop screen all day!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R

customer_reviews.title: the definition and colors are super sharp. This is a great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly thin with a much smaller foot print that my last 24" monitor. It's a full 1.5 inches less wide and 1.5 inches less tall, but is still 24" diagonally. The monitor is mostly screen with about a 1/4" stainless steel bezel wrapping the screen. The backlight is very bright (I actually had to turn it down for my tastes), the definition and colors are super sharp. This is a great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Keltin

customer_reviews.title: Auto resize is jacked up
customer_reviews.text: The monitors have an issue with arbitrarily resizing inappropriately. I.e., browsing the web and all of a sudden the monitor decides auto size (takes about 5 seconds) but the new dimensions it sets are incorrect, and leaves a black section on one side of the screen with the other side running off the screen. It can really grind your gears if you're really into something and the monitor decides to interrupt it like this. Other than that they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are amazing. I bought two for working from home. They have a larger display than my work monitors and the display settings are very customizable. This is important to me because I like a dark screen.
customer_reviews.author: Marge N.

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice and slim screen
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice and slim screen, it is a great budget monitor with a beautiful picture. Only con is the power adapter. It is rather large, so that will knock it down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Monitor and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have a new great appreciation for Sceptre. The quality was amazing for a monitor that was inexpensive. The monitor stand was made out of metal and even came with magnetic screws and screwdriver. Where most stands are plastic with cheap parts. Was shocked pleasantly, by the quality and packaging, given only paid $99. Great job Sceptre
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. It's so light and thin, but very substantial. Finish is fine. When I first installed it and it showed a note that there was no input detected, I was deflated...until I realized that I had failed to turn my PC on again! Since, it's been working like a champ. The picture is fast and clear. The colors outstanding. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: R. Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Dead Monitor after 18 Months
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked fine especially for the cost, but it died today after 18 months of use. The power LED lights up, but nothing shows on the display. During the time that it worked, I only experienced a couple dead pixels. I liked the size for a dual setup (have another monitor that’s older and still functioning well). This would have been a good buy if it hadn’t died after only a year and a half of owning it.
customer_reviews.author: Super Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for home use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor for home use. I bought this monitor to replace the Sceptre 20" monitor that had some issues with pixelation of small letters. This is a great monitor at a great price, my only complaint would be that it only comes with a VGA cable. Not really sure why they did that.
customer_reviews.author: Leo J. Ramos-DeGuzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was asked to work from home on a laptop, so I needed a bigger monitor. The order came WAY ahead of what the initial delivery date was shown. . . .instead of 6-8 days, it came in 2 days. Amazon is AMAZING! The monitor is super light and very easy to set up and start working. I just had to adjust a couple settings for a clearer picture/screen, but that was very easy to do. This monitor works perfectly for what I needed and I'm extremely happy with the monitor and the price. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an analyst and work from home. I bought 2 of these for a dual monitor set up for my work computer. These are phenominal monitors for the price. Stands were easy to put together. I didn't have trouble with one, but the screws were too long for the 2nd one I bought. I just put washers on the screws and it is rock solid. Definitely a great buy for the price! I hooked one up with HDMI and the other with VGA and both have a fantastic picture. I want to buy another for my personal computer and probably will.
customer_reviews.author: KZT

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Sucker...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome deal. I use it for my old (2008/5.1) MacBook running Ubuntu and my 2016 Asus Chromebook, I just keep a stack of adapters in my drawer. I love the simplicity and bare bones bezel. The stand is functional (tilt but no rise) and it's adjustable without a whole slew of annoying lights. I'm an old guy who's paid scads of money for many smaller and sucky monitors. I'm amazed at this critter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Runge

customer_reviews.title: VERY THIN, NICE LOOKING MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this to pair with my new gaming pc. I play a lot of FPS games and have had no problems with lag or ghosting. Very responsive monitor. This monitor is incredibly thin but well made. I have my pc hooked up through the hdmi and it looks great. No speakers though but no big deal, you can purchase a decent pair of cpu speakers for like $10-$15.
customer_reviews.author: Amb G

customer_reviews.title: Good display and good value
customer_reviews.text: Good display and good value. I took one star out for two things. One the monitor doesn't have an auto start mode when I plug in the HDMI cable. You have to turn the screen off and on every time. Second, when I called tech support to see if I was missing something when this came up as an issue, the person I talked to seemed mad about me calling them and was extremely rude. I'm sure my question sounded dumb to him but it was a concern to me.
customer_reviews.author: gethanga

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR THE PRICE!! Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: This super thin monitor is awesome! I really was worried that for $99 I was going to get a cheap monitor, boy was I wrong. Right when I took it out of the box I noticed how light weight it is, which I love compared to how heavy the old monitors are. When I fired up the monitor I was blown away at how clear and stunning the picture was. It exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Book

customer_reviews.title: Overall great quality and price, wish it had all 4 VESA threads.
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very clear in these monitors, They perform well but only have two VESA threads. Pros Image quality is outstanding (non-gamer) No speakers Sleek look w/ thin borders Cons: Only 2 VESA mount threads - Had to do some adjusting of the arms to get them to stay put since the monitor's weight was not evenly distributed on the VESA plate.
customer_reviews.author: awsengr

customer_reviews.title: Great product - set up instructions leave a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my in-home office. Can't beat the price on these Spectre monitors! The set up instructions were not very well-ordered or clear, but in the end I was able to figure out how to attach the neck and base. The neck back needs to be removed for screws to go in - it wasn't included in the appropriate place in the setup manual. Excited to see how long it lasts. Also the blue-light dimmer is awesome, I can already tell my eyes are thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitors. Installing the stand is a little confusing. The metal piece that attaches to the stand and the back of the monitor has a plastic cover on it. Take that cover off, and you'll reveal the holes for the screws. I was confused for a while. Good monitors so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy

customer_reviews.title: Can't even assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 screws, one base, a screwdriver, a monitor, 2 m4 (?) screws (like silver bolts but with one hollow end and one end with some screw thing? Something obviously for mounting), a monitor neck, and the monitor can not be assembled! I have to basically just leave it standing on the bottom. Oh right, thanks for sending me the wrong model!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bocce

customer_reviews.title: Best Bargain Ever
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough, I upgraded from a 21.5, but this seems Much bigger, and it fits under my 15.5" shelve, since the monitor tilts and the height claimed is taller than that. My old company could never ship an empty box for $100, due to all the quality crap. How can they make money selling it for this price??
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty damn good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is spectacular for a 1080p monitor. It's got a very bright vibrant color, clear and crisp picture. The 24 inch size is more than enough for me, I actually eneded up buying two of these (one to replace my second monitor, as I have a dual setup). I love the low-profile metal trim around the edge. It's sleek and sharp, but doesn't draw your eye from the screen or distract you. All in all I would say this is is a fantastic monitor for it's price range.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: After a month, screen goes completely black.
customer_reviews.text: I turned on my computer in the morning and went to the bathroom to find that the monitor would not display anything. The screen is completely black with not even the no signal sign. The power is on because it has the blue light on the power button but beyond that I can't not tell the problem. I tried using a HDMI cord instead of the VGA and it had no change. Overall, faulty piece of equipment which I can't even replace now because it had just passed the one month since I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Sadienrose

customer_reviews.title: But after 2 months and 5 days I can honestly tell all of you that this was actually a very good purchase. NOTE
customer_reviews.text: So here is an honest 2 month review. I purchased this monitor 2 months and 5 days ago. I was honestly extremely worried about the quality of this monitor because of the price. But after 2 months and 5 days I can honestly tell all of you that this was actually a very good purchase. NOTE: This monitor does not come with a remote, and it does not have built in speakers. But that is nothing that a pair of Astro A40's cant fix! 8/10 overall product. Very responsive. If I lost this monitor today, would I go out and buy another one? Well no, I would buy a 4K monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jorgenson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as promised, I have to say I have purchased many monitors in the past but this one is AMAZING! The slim line look of it is wonderful, it is very close to being frame-less with as small as the frame is which makes it even more attractive. The stainless look is also an added feature that makes the quality look even nicer. The video coloring of the monitor itself is once again wonderful. It has a very cool appeal that helps your eyes. Over all I am extremely happy with this item and will be purchasing only this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor, a little clunky to install the stand. I've used it for 6, 9 hour work days and just noticed 2 dead pixels within 1 sq inch of each other.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just like the headline says, you cant beat these for the price. If you just want an additional monitor or two for watching movies or office stuff these are perfect. I dont know that Id trust them to edit photos or anything, but theyre great for movies, gaming, or spreadsheet / document work.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: So light...
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the 720p television that I was using for my hand-me-down system. I was a little concerned with only two VESA mounting points, but decided to take a chance after watching a review video and seeing the presenter mounting his on a dual desk mount. This monitor is so light, two mounting screws is just fine, it mates up nicely with the. Now, the only issue I have now is to figure out how to loosen the joints on the stand to freely move the screen. I will definitely be purchasing another for my main home computer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen, resolution is awesome! Works great for my home distance teaching needs. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is due to the fact that the stand is unmovable and the screen arches downward. I have to raise the entire thing on something so that I am not hurting my neck looking down.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: There is a sucker born every... and I am one; this POS lasted 5 months and now flickers all the time even on startup screen with no input. No feed back from company as yet with an email. Lucky I had and old spare around, HP which works but is a little off. Just bought a Phillips 25 inch and paid the extra $50 as it has a 3 year warantee.
customer_reviews.author: Samoa Tech

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good picture. So far good reliability.
customer_reviews.text: For the money the picture is great. Compared to high end models it's okay. Viewing angle is decent. It doesn't strain the eyes and the colors seem good enough. For the money it gets the job done. I have 6 of them running at once so saved quite a bit of money on my multiple display setup with these.
customer_reviews.author: The Weavers

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two - would do it again
customer_reviews.text: I picked up two of these while working at home. I'm satisfied and would buy them again; you just can beat the price. They are both super thin and have a great form factor. Picture is good quality, but I am not a gamer and I'm not using them to watch movies. Only complain is that when using them on the stands that were included, one is a good 1/2 " taller than the other, not sure why. All in all, I am satisfied and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup right out the box. Beautiful monitors!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought two monitors for my home office set-up. What can I say, they are simply amazing for the price I paid. Thin bezels, light weight, easy setup and beautiful color renditions. I noticed every now and then there is a slight lag from my laptop to the display especially when watching YouTube videos, but I'm keeping it at a 5 star rating because compared to what I used to have....this is minor.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price, but after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the price, but after a couple months, the base detached from the stem that holds the monitor. Unfortunately it's only held by 2 very small screws which isn't much support. I was able to put it back together with slightly thicker screws but fear it will detach again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: These monitors are very nice for the price and look amazing on the desk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of them a to replace my old monitors. These monitors are very nice for the price and look amazing on the desk. I paired them with a Mac Mini and the setup is clean and minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor/Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor at a great price! When you first set it up the default is two monitors so you need to go to display and change it to single (unless you are using 2 monitors). If you don't, the mouse will run off the right side of the screen!
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, edges get really hot VERY fast
customer_reviews.text: Just got them, easy to set up, good picture, no problems so far. One thing, though: both monitors have been turned on for less than 25 minutes, and they're HOT. Like, touch-the-edge-too-long-and-you-get-a-blister hot. Not awesome, after such a short time powered up. Hopefully that won't get worse.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ford

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought metallic thin body, and I like it! I hooked it to my new docking system as the second monitor added to the laptop. It's bright, clear resolution, prettg design... i don't really have anything to complain! It comes with everything you need. It comes witb VGA cable, stand, back of the stand cover, and even the screw drivee you will need to connect the body to the stand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is fairly impressive for what we expected. The brand Sceptre was a little skeptical, but I do have to say this is an amazing monitor whether you are using this for gaming, alternative for a TV, or the computer. It is super thin which makes it great for almost looking as if the entire monitor's front is just the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre 24 Inch Ultra Thin Ultra Slim 1080P 75Hz LED Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a 2nd monitor as part of my children's distance learning setup that could also be used for 1080P gaming once they didn't need it for school work. They have used it now for several weeks and like it much better than their previous Hanns G setup.
customer_reviews.author: J. Todd

customer_reviews.title: great deal price
customer_reviews.text: well, i bought two of these monitors.. great deal price... one works okay, the second one just died out on me exactly 31 days new and ONE day past the allowable return date!!!!! so what good is a deal like that. won't do that again. deal or no deal winds up no deal in the end!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: dying already
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with the quality of this monitor. I haven't had it that long and already the screen is starting to go. It surges and pulses and has a tail behind the text. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Healy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible hunk of junk that’s not even worth 5$
customer_reviews.text: I got this awhile back and it didn’t last a month. The picture is not even close to being good, the material ISNT EVEN METAL, it has no DVI port, worst part of all it that some people claim it’s GOOD, I have money that they were just PAID to say it’s good cause it’s just a terrible monitor. Don’t waste your hard earned money on this and just save up for an ACER or some other more HIGH QUALITY monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Requires putting screws to connect to stand and still not sturdy on its own
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this after ordering it because it requires screws to connect it to the base. Even then, the base and the stand do not readily stand on its own. Did not realize this when ordering, so going to return it for another monitor where it can all be connected without screws and still have the right stability
customer_reviews.author: kkimothy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor except placement of power button
customer_reviews.text: I really like the video quality as a second monitor using HDMI. I use it for data and an occasional youtube video. The only issue is the power button being on the back of the unit. If I shut off the PC or go into sleep mode, I have to reach under the monitor to turn it off. Really problematic if you want to have it as a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Ken

customer_reviews.title: looks good, not quite at 75Hz
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and looks nice, it's really thin. Cons: power adaptor is really huge, not quite at 75Hz according to windows.
customer_reviews.author: Goodwine

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Had this monitor for about 6 months and it started acting up and flashing like a strobe light. It looks pretty good and is super light weight but if it only functions properly for six months it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KMLobster

customer_reviews.title: low quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is very poor. The stand does not firmly hold the monitor in place as a result the monitor is loose and wobbles. The finish looks cheap especially after you remove the strategically placed stickers hiding the poorly fitting brushed metal corners. I plan to return this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: John Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great value - very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great price - great picture quality. I'm using for office work and purchased as an extension from my 13" Dell laptop screen. It was the same resolution, so I didn't have to worry about the picture being too big for the screen. It meshed well. Easy setup installing the stand and I was pleasantly surprised that they gave a Phillips screw driver out of the box. It was convenient because I was away from my tools at work. Power chord is thin and isn't bulky like 95% of every other monitor out there. It's less of an eyesore. Looks cool, thin, crisp image, cheap = lots of value... buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this for my partner, and he loved it from the moment he opened the box and say the beautiful design and the use of the connectivity to the actual use of it on his computer. He was so pleased that we have just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor to replace a 12 year old Sceptre monitor of similar size. Picture quality is excellent with no dead pixels. Works great for internet browsing and home office applications. I was impressed by how thin and light weight it is. I do not do any gaming on this monitor but I have watched videos with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alacak türk arkadaşlar için yazıyorum. Eğer imkanınız varsa Türkiye ...
customer_reviews.text: Alacak türk arkadaşlar için yazıyorum. Eğer imkanınız varsa Türkiye içi tedarik edin. Eğer buradan almayı istiyorsanız bir kaç şeyi göz önünde bulundurup riske atmanız gerekiyor. Benim ürünümde kargo biraz hasarlı gelmişti ama çok şükür ki ekranda sıkıntı yok. Sanırsam fabrika çıkışlı sorun var. Monitörün sol alt köşesinde siyah çizgiler ve sağ tarafında boydan boya ince bir siyah boşluk var. Göz zevkinizi bozmayacak şekilde film veya oyun ile ilgilenirken herhangi bir sıkıntı yaratmıyor. Amazon hediye kartına sahipseniz (Hediye olarak geldiyse) ve bu ürüne ihtiyacınız varsa tavsiye ederim. Elektronik aletlerde bu tür sorunlarla karşılaşmak normal bir durum. Teşekkürler :)
customer_reviews.author: Naci

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor at great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the slim, sleek design of this monitor. The border around the screen is so thin that the monitor's overall size was a few inches less than I would expect from a 24" monitor giving me a little more room for my desktop arrangement. The only downside to this monitor is that it doesn't have all the bells and whistles (i.e. extra USB ports, adjustable height). Other than that it's a great monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Missing Part. No return call from customer support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor to replace one that had started to flicker. When I showed up, I disconnected the old one first. When I went to assemble the new monitor, it was missing the neck bracket to attach the stand to the monitor. I called customer support and left a message. My call was never returned. It's probably a decent monitor if it comes with all the pieces but overall was a pretty frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gosta K. Lovgren

customer_reviews.title: Decent display when it recognizes your input
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent display....when it turns on. I have trouble getting it to recognize my laptop when I first reconnect it in the morning. It takes anywhere from 5 to 10 of disconnecting and reconnecting the HDMI cable and turning the display on and off for it to recognize that my laptop is plugged in and start working. Also, I have not been able to get the colors and contrast to match (or even get close to) my MacBook Pro despite playing with the settings for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Allan

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor. I searched around for one for about a week before I purchased and this has been the clear winner. It is cheaper and looks way better than most of the $2-300 ones I looked at. I needed to replace one of dual monitors at my office and this one is so great I am ordering another one to replace the other monitor just to have two of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried how bad the picture was when I first turned it on, but after some quick adjustments to brightness/contrast...everything is awesome. Installing the stand took ~2 mins and they even included a screwdriver. There's nothing too fancy about the design. The screen is VERY thin and the slim metallic bezel is easy on the eyes. Some people complain about the power supply on the plug, but it's not an issue for me. At the moment, I think you'll have a hard time finding a better 24" 1080p monitor for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JBow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor. It is very bright with a great picture. It is also very thin and light. It does have two small issues however, the controls are on the back of the monitor and can be hard to reach and there are audio in/out ports but no built in speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden L

customer_reviews.title: Purchased re-manufactured.  Its brand new :)
customer_reviews.text: The slim design is great for saving space but the menu and power buttons are tucked away because of this. Overall, it is a well designed monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Solid monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first monitor and I really like it. Great look thin bezels also extremely clear! Also easy to see if there's glare in the room. I think it's great for the price can't go wrong. Hardly takes up room on your desk. The only thing I wish that Amazon would have done was not ship it in the original packaging at least put it in another box. Other than that solid monitor for the price! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
